tier.item: b. Na a bana di Ppa tya kon, dati a nyan.
Foc Det banana Rel father carry come that 3sg eat
A bere hati, a nyan bana
3sg stomach hurt 3sg eat banana
aforementioned that father brought that is what he ate. His stomach is
` THE BANANA
aching because he ate the banana.'
b. Na a bana di Ppa tya kon, dati a nyan.
Foc Det banana Rel father carry come that 3sg eat
A bere hati, a nyan bana
3sg stomach hurt 3sg eat banana
` THE aforementioned BANANA that father brought that is what he ate. His stomach is

Na a bana di Ppa tya kon, dati a nyan. A bere hati, a nyan bana
Foc Det banana Rel father carry come that 3sg eat 3sg stomach hurt 3sg eat banana

tier.item: b. J'ai vue une certaine guitare ce matin, je ne me rappelle plus
I have seen a certain guitar this morning, I not 1sg-acc remember anymore
la marque mais elle ressemble beaucoup a la tienne.
the trademark but it resembles very.much to Det yours

yours.'
